item.title: Computing precision FO
item.description: Computing precision FO Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1320 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/regression/currencies/computingPrecision_FO.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > International > Localization > Currencies > Edit Euro currency Set decimals to 3. In BO, create a percentage discount (15%), and a Free Gift discount (with free Mug Today is a Good Day) On Mug Today is a good day product, add a specific price, starting a 3 units, giving a 30% discount On FO, add 4 Mug Today is a good day.
